original_text: (just as these are taken from the ox of the sacrifice of the peace offerings); and the priest shall burn them on the altar of burnt offering.
korean_text: 화목제 제물의 소에게서 떼어냄 같이 할 것이요 제사장은 그것을 번제단 위에서 불사를 것이며

sentences.original_text: from the ox of the sacrifice of the peace offerings
and the priest shall burn them
on the altar of burnt offering
